SnpTxtHeader.Txt:
(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO  IN ('30','31','32') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('5')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO  IN ('33') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('3','5','10')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO IN ('34') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('2','3','5')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO IN ('35') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('1','2','3','4','5','6','7','9','10')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO  IN ('36','37') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE NOT IN ('1','2','3','5','7','9','10')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO  IN ('38','39') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('1','2','5','7','9','10')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO  IN ('40','41') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('1','2','10')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO  IN ('42','43','44','45','46','47','48','49') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('1','2','5','7','9','10'))
ATS_TH_AT26.CODIGOCONTABLE != '0'
ATS_TH_AT26.CODIGOPARROQUIA != 0
ATS_TH_AT26.FECHAFRAUDE > '20101231'

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOPERSONA IN ('E','P','V') AND ATS_TH_AT26.GENERO IN (1,2))

OR 

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOPERSONA NOT IN ('E','P','V') AND ATS_TH_AT26.GENERO IN (0))

OR 

(ATS_TH_AT26.AFECTACIONMONETARIA IN (3) AND ATS_TH_AT26.GENERO IN (1,2))

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOPERSONA IN ('V') AND ATS_TH_AT26.IDCLIENTE BETWEEN 1 AND 40000000)

OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOPERSONA IN ('E') AND 
(ATS_TH_AT26.IDCLIENTE BETWEEN 1 AND 1500000
OR ATS_TH_AT26.IDCLIENTE BETWEEN 80000000 AND 100000000))

OR 

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOPERSONA IN ('J', 'G') AND ATS_TH_AT26.IDCLIENTE > 0)
ATS_TH_AT26.MONTOFRAUDE > 0

(ATS_TH_AT26.AFECTACIONMONETARIA IN (2,3) AND ATS_TH_AT26.MONTOFRAUDEEXTERNO > 0)
OR
(ATS_TH_AT26.AFECTACIONMONETARIA IN (1) AND ATS_TH_AT26.MONTOFRAUDEEXTERNO = 0)

(ATS_TH_AT26.AFECTACIONMONETARIA IN (1,3) AND ATS_TH_AT26.MONTOFRAUDEINTERNO > 0)
OR
(ATS_TH_AT26.AFECTACIONMONETARIA IN (2) AND ATS_TH_AT26.MONTOFRAUDEINTERNO = 0)
ATS_TH_AT26.NROFRAUDE IS NOT NULL

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOPERSONA IN ('E','P','V') AND 
ATS_TH_AT26.PENSIONADOIVSS NOT IN (0)) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOPERSONA NOT IN ('E','P','V') AND 
ATS_TH_AT26.PENSIONADOIVSS IN (0))

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOPERSONA IN ('E','P','V') AND ATS_TH_AT26.GENERO NOT IN (0))
OR
(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOPERSONA NOT IN ('E','P','V') AND ATS_TH_AT26.GENERO IN (0))

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO IN (30,31,32) AND ATS_TH_AT26.RED != 0)
OR
(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO NOT IN (30,31,32) AND ATS_TH_AT26.RED = 0)

ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO IN ('30','32') 
AND ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOFRANQUICIA NOT IN ('0')

OR

ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO NOT IN ('30','32') 
AND ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOFRANQUICIA IN ('0')

(ATS_TH_AT26.AFECTACIONMONETARIA IN ('1') AND ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOPERSONA IN ('J','G'))

OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.AFECTACIONMONETARIA IN ('3') AND ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOPERSONA IN('0'))

OR 

ATS_TH_AT26.AFECTACIONMONETARIA NOT IN ('0')
select sys_guid() from dual
Nombre del archivo de transmisión, AT número que identifica el archivo de transmisión. Ejemplo: ?AT03?.

Código del Ente Supervisado, 
Suministrado por la Sudeban y utilizado en las transmisiones electrónicas. Para Bancaribe el código es 01410 y para Bangente 01422.


Bancaribe  =  01410
 Bangente =  01422
SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-28,'MM'),'mm/dd/yyyy') FROM DUAL
SELECT TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE-28),'mm/dd/yyyy') FROM DUAL
SELECT '#FechaInicio_M' FROM DUAL
SELECT '#FechaFin_M' FROM DUAL
select TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('#FechaFin','MM/DD/YY'),'YYMMDD') from dual

Código del Ente Supervisado, 
Suministrado por la Sudeban y utilizado en las transmisiones electrónicas. Para Bancaribe el código es 01410 y para Bangente 01422.


Bancaribe  =  01410
 Bangente =  01422

select directorio from RUTA_DIRAT
where nombreat = '#FileAT'
Select TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYMMDD')   from DUAL
SELECT 'ErrorValid' FROM DUAL

SELECT (SUBSTR(directorio,1,LENGTH(directorio)-LENGTH('#FileAT'))) FROM RUTA_DIRAT 
WHERE nombreat = '#FileAT'
Variable para declarar el nombre de la tabla de validación para el envío de los correos de errores.
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #AT_TablaValidacion
select 0 from dual

select 
 case when to_char(SYSDATE,'dd/mm/yy') in (select to_char(df_fecha,'dd/mm/yy') from ods.cl_dias_feriados where substr(df_year,3,2)=substr(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yy'),7,2)) then 1
 else 0
 end status
from dual

SnpScenTask.DefTxt:
select 
 case when to_char(SYSDATE,'dd/mm/yy') in (select to_char(df_fecha,'dd/mm/yy') from ods.cl_dias_feriados where substr(df_year,3,2)=substr(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yy'),7,2)) then 1
 else 0
 end status
from dual

select directorio from RUTA_DIRAT
where nombreat = '#ODI_AT_SUDEBAN_DEV.FileAT'

Execution of the Scenario AT26_TO_FILE version 001
Execution of the Scenario AT26_TO_FILEBG version 001

SnpScenTask.DefTxt:
create table <?=snpRef.getObjectNameDefaultPSchema("L", "SNP_CHECK_TAB", "W") ?>
(
	CATALOG_NAME	<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?> ,
	SCHEMA_NAME	<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?> ,
	RESOURCE_NAME	<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	FULL_RES_NAME	<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	ERR_TYPE		<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	ERR_MESS		<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?> ,
	CHECK_DATE	<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	ORIGIN		<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	CONS_NAME	<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "128") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	CONS_TYPE		<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	ERR_COUNT		<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "10") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>
)

delete from	<?=snpRef.getObjectNameDefaultPSchema("L", "SNP_CHECK_TAB", "W") ?>
where	SCHEMA_NAME	= '<?=snpRef.getSchemaName("LS_ATSUDEBAN", "D") ?>'
and	ORIGIN 		= 'ATS_TH_AT26'
and	ERR_TYPE 		= 'S'

create table <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFATS_TH_AT26", "W") ?>
(
	ODI_ROW_ID 		UROWID,
	ODI_ERR_TYPE		<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, 
	ODI_ERR_MESS		<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	ODI_CHECK_DATE	<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, 
	NROFRAUDE	VARCHAR2(20) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	CAUSAFRAUDE	VARCHAR2(20) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	TIPOINSTRUMENTO	VARCHAR2(2) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	CANALFRAUDE	VARCHAR2(255) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	TIPOFRAUDE	VARCHAR2(2) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	TIPOFRANQUICIA	VARCHAR2(255) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	MONTOFRAUDE	NUMBER(15,2) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	AFECTACIONMONETARIA	VARCHAR2(2) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	CODIGOCONTABLE	VARCHAR2(20) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	TIPOPERSONA	VARCHAR2(50) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	IDCLIENTE	VARCHAR2(50) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	GENERO	VARCHAR2(50) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	RANGOEDAD	VARCHAR2(50) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	PENSIONADOIVSS	VARCHAR2(50) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	NRORECLAMO	VARCHAR2(20) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	FECHAFRAUDE	VARCHAR2(8) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	CODIGOPARROQUIA	VARCHAR2(8) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	NOMBRECLIENTE	VARCHAR2(255) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	TIPOOPERACION	VARCHAR2(50) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	MONTOFRAUDEINTERNO	NUMBER(15,2) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	MONTOFRAUDEEXTERNO	NUMBER(15,2) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	RED	VARCHAR2(50) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	CODIGOCUENTA	VARCHAR2(50) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	ODI_ORIGIN		<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	ODI_CONS_NAME	<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "128") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	ODI_CONS_TYPE		<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2") ?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	ODI_PK			<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "32") ?> PRIMARY KEY,
	ODI_SESS_NO		<?=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "19") ?>
)

delete from 	<?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFATS_TH_AT26", "W") ?>
where	(ODI_ERR_TYPE = 'S'	and 'S' = 'S')
or	(ODI_ERR_TYPE = 'S'	and ODI_ORIGIN = 'ATS_TH_AT26')

insert into <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFATS_TH_AT26", "W") ?>
(	ODI_PK,
	ODI_SESS_NO,
	ODI_ROW_ID,
	ODI_ERR_TYPE,
	ODI_ERR_MESS,
	ODI_CHECK_DATE,
	ODI_ORIGIN,
	ODI_CONS_NAME,
	ODI_CONS_TYPE,
	NROFRAUDE,
	CAUSAFRAUDE,
	TIPOINSTRUMENTO,
	CANALFRAUDE,
	TIPOFRAUDE,
	TIPOFRANQUICIA,
	MONTOFRAUDE,
	AFECTACIONMONETARIA,
	CODIGOCONTABLE,
	TIPOPERSONA,
	IDCLIENTE,
	GENERO,
	RANGOEDAD,
	PENSIONADOIVSS,
	NRORECLAMO,
	FECHAFRAUDE,
	CODIGOPARROQUIA,
	NOMBRECLIENTE,
	TIPOOPERACION,
	MONTOFRAUDEINTERNO,
	MONTOFRAUDEEXTERNO,
	RED,
	CODIGOCUENTA
)
select	SYS_GUID(),
	<?=snpRef.getSession("SESS_NO") ?>, 
	rowid,
	'S', 
	'1. Si [Tipo de Instrumento Fraude] es igual a 30, 31 y 32, el canal no puede ser 5
2. Si [Tipo de Instrumento Fraude] es igual a 33 el canal no puede ser 3, 5 ni 10
3. Si [Tipo de Instrumento Fraude] es igual a 34 el canal no puede ser 2, 3, 5
4. Si ',
	sysdate,
	'ATS_TH_AT26',
	'Canal Fraude',
	'CK',	
	NROFRAUDE,
	CAUSAFRAUDE,
	TIPOINSTRUMENTO,
	CANALFRAUDE,
	TIPOFRAUDE,
	TIPOFRANQUICIA,
	MONTOFRAUDE,
	AFECTACIONMONETARIA,
	CODIGOCONTABLE,
	TIPOPERSONA,
	IDCLIENTE,
	GENERO,
	RANGOEDAD,
	PENSIONADOIVSS,
	NRORECLAMO,
	FECHAFRAUDE,
	CODIGOPARROQUIA,
	NOMBRECLIENTE,
	TIPOOPERACION,
	MONTOFRAUDEINTERNO,
	MONTOFRAUDEEXTERNO,
	RED,
	CODIGOCUENTA
from	<?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "ATS_TH_AT26", "D") ?>  ATS_TH_AT26
where	not 	(
		(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO  IN ('30','31','32') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('5')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO  IN ('33') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('3','5','10')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO IN ('34') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('2','3','5')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO IN ('35') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('1','2','3','4','5','6','7','9','10')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO  IN ('36','37') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE NOT IN ('1','2','3','5','7','9','10')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO  IN ('38','39') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('1','2','5','7','9','10')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO  IN ('40','41') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('1','2','10')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO  IN ('42','43','44','45','46','47','48','49') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('1','2','5','7','9','10'))
		)

	rowid,
	'S', 
	'1. El valor de este campo debe ser distinto que (?0 ? No aplica?).',
	sysdate,
	'ATS_TH_AT26',
	'Codigo Contable',
	'CK',	
	NROFRAUDE,
	CAUSAFRAUDE,
	TIPOINSTRUMENTO,
	CANALFRAUDE,
	TIPOFRAUDE,
	TIPOFRANQUICIA,
	MONTOFRAUDE,
	AFECTACIONMONETARIA,
	CODIGOCONTABLE,
	TIPOPERSONA,
	IDCLIENTE,
	GENERO,
	RANGOEDAD,
	PENSIONADOIVSS,

	MONTOFRAUDEEXTERNO,

		ATS_TH_AT26.CODIGOCONTABLE != '0'
		)

select	SYS_GUID(),
	<?=snpRef.getSession("SESS_NO") ?>, 
	rowid,
	'S', 
	'1. Si el valor del campo [Tipo de Persona] es igual que (?E ? Extranjero?, ?P ? Pasaporte o ?V ? Venezolano); entonces el valor de este campo debe ser igual que (?1 ? Femenino? o ?2 ? Masculino?).

2. Si el valor del campo [Tipo de Persona] es distin',
	sysdate,
	'ATS_TH_AT26',
	'Genero',
	'CK',	
	NROFRAUDE,

2. Si el valor del campo [Tipo de Persona] es igual que (?E ? Extranjero?); entonces el valor de este campo ',
	sysdate,
	'ATS_TH_AT26',
	'Identificacion Cliente',
	'CK',	
	NROFRAUDE,
	CAUSAFRAUDE,
	TIPOINSTRUMENTO,
	CANALFRAUDE,
	TIPOFRAUDE,
	TIPOFRANQUICIA,
	MONTOFRAUDE,
	AFECTACIONMONETARIA,

	MONTOFRAUDEEXTERNO,
	RED,

from	<?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "ATS_TH_AT26", "D") ?>  ATS_TH_AT26
where	not 	(
		(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOPERSONA IN ('V') AND ATS_TH_AT26.IDCLIENTE BETWEEN 1 AND 40000000)

OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOPERSONA IN ('E') AND 
(ATS_TH_AT26.IDCLIENTE BETWEEN 1 AND 1500000
OR ATS_TH_AT26.IDCLIENTE BETWEEN 80000000 AND 100000000))

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOPERSONA IN ('J', 'G') AND ATS_TH_AT26.IDCLIENTE > 0)
		)

	ODI_ERR_MESS,
	ODI_CHECK_DATE,
	ODI_ORIGIN,
	ODI_CONS_NAME,
	ODI_CONS_TYPE,
	NROFRAUDE,
	CAUSAFRAUDE,
	TIPOINSTRUMENTO,
	CANALFRAUDE,
	TIPOFRAUDE,
	TIPOFRANQUICIA,
	MONTOFRAUDE,
	AFECTACIONMONETARIA,
	CODIGOCONTABLE,
	TIPOPERSONA,
	IDCLIENTE,
	GENERO,
	RANGOEDAD,
	PENSIONADOIVSS,
	NRORECLAMO,
	FECHAFRAUDE,
	CODIGOPARROQUIA,
	NOMBRECLIENTE,
	TIPOOPERACION,
	MONTOFRAUDEINTERNO,
	MONTOFRAUDEEXTERNO,
	RED,
	CODIGOCUENTA
)
select	SYS_GUID(),
	<?=snpRef.getSession("SESS_NO") ?>, 
	rowid,
	'S', 
	'1. Si el valor del campo [Afectación Monetaria del Fraude] es igual que (?1 ? Interno?); entonces el valor de este campo debe ser igual que (?J ? Jurídico? o ?G ? Gobierno?).

2. Si el valor del campo [Afectación Monetaria del Fraude] es igual que (?',
	sysdate,
	'ATS_TH_AT26',
	'Tipo Persona',
	'CK',	
	NROFRAUDE,
	CAUSAFRAUDE,
	TIPOINSTRUMENTO,
	CANALFRAUDE,
	TIPOFRAUDE,
	TIPOFRANQUICIA,
	MONTOFRAUDE,
	AFECTACIONMONETARIA,
	CODIGOCONTABLE,
	TIPOPERSONA,
	IDCLIENTE,
	GENERO,
	RANGOEDAD,
	PENSIONADOIVSS,
	NRORECLAMO,
	FECHAFRAUDE,
	CODIGOPARROQUIA,
	NOMBRECLIENTE,
	TIPOOPERACION,
	MONTOFRAUDEINTERNO,
	MONTOFRAUDEEXTERNO,
	RED,
	CODIGOCUENTA
from	<?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "ATS_TH_AT26", "D") ?>  ATS_TH_AT26
where	not 	(
		(ATS_TH_AT26.AFECTACIONMONETARIA IN ('1') AND ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOPERSONA IN ('J','G'))

OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.AFECTACIONMONETARIA IN ('3') AND ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOPERSONA IN('0'))

OR 

ATS_TH_AT26.AFECTACIONMONETARIA NOT IN ('0')
		)

insert into <?=snpRef.getObjectNameDefaultPSchema("L", "SNP_CHECK_TAB", "W") ?>
(
	SCHEMA_NAME,
	RESOURCE_NAME,
	FULL_RES_NAME,
	ERR_TYPE,
	ERR_MESS,
	CHECK_DATE,
	ORIGIN,
	CONS_NAME,
	CONS_TYPE,
	ERR_COUNT
)
select	
	'<?=snpRef.getSchemaName("LS_ATSUDEBAN", "D") ?>',
	'ATS_TH_AT26',
	'<?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "ATS_TH_AT26", "LS_ATSUDEBAN", "", "D") ?>',
	E.ODI_ERR_TYPE,
	E.ODI_ERR_MESS,
	E.ODI_CHECK_DATE,
	E.ODI_ORIGIN,
	E.ODI_CONS_NAME,
	E.ODI_CONS_TYPE,
	count(1) 
from	<?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFATS_TH_AT26", "W") ?> E
where	E.ODI_ERR_TYPE	= 'S'
and	E.ODI_ORIGIN 	= 'ATS_TH_AT26'
group by	E.ODI_ERR_TYPE,
	E.ODI_ERR_MESS,
	E.ODI_CHECK_DATE,
	E.ODI_ORIGIN,
	E.ODI_CONS_NAME,
	E.ODI_CONS_TYPE

SnpScenStep.StepName: Execution of the Scenario AT26_TO_FILE_ERROR version 001

SnpScenTask.DefTxt: DELETE FROM ATS_TH_AT26_H WHERE FECHA_CIERRE IN ('#ODI_AT_SUDEBAN_DEV.FechaFin')

insert into	<?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "ATS_TH_AT26_H", "LS_ATSUDEBAN", "", "D") ?> 
( 
	NROFRAUDE,
	CAUSAFRAUDE,
	TIPOINSTRUMENTO,
	CANALFRAUDE,
	TIPOFRAUDE,
	TIPOFRANQUICIA,
	MONTOFRAUDE,
	AFECTACIONMONETARIA,
	CODIGOCONTABLE,
	TIPOPERSONA,
	IDCLIENTE,
	GENERO,
	RANGOEDAD,
	PENSIONADOIVSS,
	NRORECLAMO,
	FECHAFRAUDE,
	CODIGOPARROQUIA,
	NOMBRECLIENTE,
	TIPOOPERACION,
	MONTOFRAUDEINTERNO,
	MONTOFRAUDEEXTERNO,
	RED,
	CODIGOCUENTA 
	,FECHA_CIERRE 
) 

select
    NROFRAUDE,
	CAUSAFRAUDE,
	TIPOINSTRUMENTO,
	CANALFRAUDE,
	TIPOFRAUDE,
	TIPOFRANQUICIA,
	MONTOFRAUDE,
	AFECTACIONMONETARIA,
	CODIGOCONTABLE,
	TIPOPERSONA,
	IDCLIENTE,
	GENERO,
	RANGOEDAD,
	PENSIONADOIVSS,
	NRORECLAMO,
	FECHAFRAUDE,
	CODIGOPARROQUIA,
	NOMBRECLIENTE,
	TIPOOPERACION,
	MONTOFRAUDEINTERNO,
	MONTOFRAUDEEXTERNO,
	RED,
	CODIGOCUENTA   
  ,'#ODI_AT_SUDEBAN_DEV.FechaFin' 
FROM (	


select 	
	ATS_TH_AT26.NROFRAUDE NROFRAUDE,
	ATS_TH_AT26.CAUSAFRAUDE CAUSAFRAUDE,
	ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO TIPOINSTRUMENTO,
	ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE CANALFRAUDE,
	ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOFRAUDE TIPOFRAUDE,
	ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOFRANQUICIA TIPOFRANQUICIA,
	ATS_TH_AT26.MONTOFRAUDE MONTOFRAUDE,
	ATS_TH_AT26.AFECTACIONMONETARIA AFECTACIONMONETARIA,
	ATS_TH_AT26.CODIGOCONTABLE CODIGOCONTABLE,
	ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOPERSONA TIPOPERSONA,
	ATS_TH_AT26.IDCLIENTE IDCLIENTE,
	ATS_TH_AT26.GENERO GENERO,
	ATS_TH_AT26.RANGOEDAD RANGOEDAD,
	ATS_TH_AT26.PENSIONADOIVSS PENSIONADOIVSS,
	ATS_TH_AT26.NRORECLAMO NRORECLAMO,
	ATS_TH_AT26.FECHAFRAUDE FECHAFRAUDE,
	ATS_TH_AT26.CODIGOPARROQUIA CODIGOPARROQUIA,
	ATS_TH_AT26.NOMBRECLIENTE NOMBRECLIENTE,
	ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOOPERACION TIPOOPERACION,
	ATS_TH_AT26.MONTOFRAUDEINTERNO MONTOFRAUDEINTERNO,
	ATS_TH_AT26.MONTOFRAUDEEXTERNO MONTOFRAUDEEXTERNO,
	ATS_TH_AT26.RED RED,
	ATS_TH_AT26.CODIGOCUENTA CODIGOCUENTA 
from	<?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "ATS_TH_AT26", "LS_ATSUDEBAN", "", "D")?>   ATS_TH_AT26
where		(1=1)	






)    ODI_GET_FROM
